listing.listing_description:
Please note: This home is in close proximity to an ongoing construction project. For more information, please contact a Villa Specialist. 

Located above a sheltered bay on Lombok’s south coast, this premier villa utilizes tall windows and natural light to illuminate a luxurious interior. With summit views of the coastal plain, guests can relax on garden recliners or plunge in the calm pool before dining in a huge central living space.

Experience a stay characterised by Lombok sunshine, pleasant breezes and top-tier facilities, with this villa easily catering for large groups. Guests can congregate at the lengthy tables and comfortable couches in the bright central space, before enjoying sunbathing, swimming, or just savoring a fresh cocktail in the garden grounds. After a busy day on the sunny coastline, indulge in a game of pool, an invigorating session in the private gym, or a delicious meal in the nearby restaurant, while the stone chamber showers, complete with seats, being ideal for freshening up in style. Balcony vantage points and viewpoint windows ensure striking views can be appreciated from all around the home. 

The gently bubbling surf of Selong Belanak Beach is just a short drive away, while respectful guided tours of traditional Sasak villages and outings to Lombok’s most beautiful waterfalls are also available. Take to the rich waters off the coast for fascinating scuba dives amongst wrecks and shoals of colorful fish, or sample local cuisine, which includes the famous plecing kangkung, a vegetarian dish incorporating water spinach and scrumptious chilli.   

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
This stunning, modern home is close to the beach, and features a property lush with mature greenery and flowers. With plenty of space to lounge, this is one of our top villas in Bali for couples traveling together. Whether you’re looking for a relaxing vacation, or one filled with adventure, Bali features plenty of natural landscapes to explore, ranging from white sandy beaches to volcanic mountains and lush rain forests.

You could easily while away a day relaxing in the sunken pool lounge, it’s outfitted with built-in sofas and is fully open on three sides allowing for tropical breezes to blow through. If you grow warm, the 30-meter swimming pool is long enough to do laps, and you can dry off afterwards on one of the nearby day beds. The rooftop terrace offers views of the ocean and is the perfect spot to sip on cocktails and watch the sun go down. Meanwhile, you can enjoy the services of a cook, butler, housekeeper and a security guard.

Inside, this villa features an ocean-inspired design scheme, including touches of aquamarine and striking images of the sea throughout. The living room features sliding glass doors that open up to the gardens as well as modern furnishings surrounding a flatscreen television. There’s also a modern kitchen filled with high-end appliances, and meals can be eaten indoors in the formal dining room or outside.

A maximum of 10 guests can stay comfortably in this home’s five bedrooms. All suites include king size beds, air conditioning and en-suites, while the two sleek master bedrooms boast semi-open-air bathrooms, balconies and views of the ocean. The other three guest suites are found in separate buildings throughout the gardens.

While staying here, you’ll be just 150 m to the rugged Cemagi Beach. Golf enthusiasts are just 9 km to Nirwana Bali Golf course and those who like to shop can hit the high-end boutiques in Seminyak, only 14 km away.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Please note: Villa Canggu North is connected to Villa Canggu South and they can be booked alongside each other to make up Canggu Estate.

Slip away to the tropics in modern style at Villa Canggu North. Set in a sleepy fishing village just steps from quiet—but up-and-coming—Nelayan Beach, this luxury Bali vacation rental offers a private but convenient setting for a warm-weather getaway, complete with staff. The villa’s two bedrooms are just the right size for a small family holiday or intimate honeymoon, or you can rent the four-bedroom sister property and host a special event or destination wedding.

Your stay at Villa Canggu North includes the services of a chef, butler, housekeeper, villa manager and others; a car and driver can also be arranged at extra cost. Spend lazy days lounging on the terrace by the pool, sipping refreshments from the bar, catching up on reading in the meditation loft, having friendly competitions around the ping-pong table or trying out new dishes on the barbecue.

Floor-to-ceiling glass walls open the gallery-like great room to the pool terrace. White walls and polished concrete floors are a quiet backdrop for tufted sofas, textured wood dining stools and vibrant contemporary paintings, murals and sculptures, including a whimsical ship suspended from the ceiling. Though the chef turns out meals from the main kitchen, a fully equipped kitchenette is tucked in one corner of the great room for guests’ use.

Both of the bedrooms at Villa Canggu North have king beds and en-suite bathrooms; one opens to a terrace as well. As in the great room, the walls are covered in playful, brightly colored artwork, while in the bathrooms, glass walls and open vanities make the most of the views of the lush surroundings and create a spa-worthy vibe.

Your Bali vacation begins with a flight into Ngurah Rai International Airport, a 13-mile drive from the villa. If you’re in search of sun, make the 1-minute walk from the house to Nelayan Beach or the short drive to Canggu Beach or Echo Beach. Browse the shops, sit down at the oceanfront restaurants or take in the show at the live music venues along the beaches, or book a surf lesson at Batu Bolong. Keep driving to play a round at Nirwana Bali Golf Club, visit the Tanah Lot Sea Temple or spend a day above the ground at Bali Treetop Adventure Park.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Villa Melissa is a stunning oceanfront villa in the Cangggu area of Bali, along the southern shore of the island. One of five villas located within Pantai Lima Estates, the villa features expansive views of the Indian Ocean from its ample pool terrace, interior living areas, and three of its five bedrooms. The extraordinary structure and design blends vintage Balinese style with contemporary amenities and comforts, enhanced by a professional staff that includes a chef, property manager, driver, housekeeping, and security. Guests enjoy access to the estate's tennis court and fitness facility, while several famed beaches are within minutes.

Perched along the shore between beautiful stone walls, the villa's terrace features an ample, T-shaped swimming pool extending from the house, lined with sun loungers and tall palms. Along the shore, twin gazebos flank a lush lawn, one with alfresco dining, one with elegant sunbeds oriented toward the sublime horizon.

Beautiful stairs ascend from the pool to the majestic home, where the terrace transitions seamlessly into an interior salon with lounge areas and soaring ceilings. An adjacent dining room features multiple tables, a bar, and glass doors opening to the ocean breeze. Gorgeous wood floors, furnishings, and trim, along with exceptional works of art, evoke the timeless culture and natural beauty of Indonesia.

All five bedroom suites include ensuite bathrooms, and three enjoy enchanting ocean views. There are three king suites, all with stand-alone showers and tubs in their bathrooms. The other two suites—one with queen bed, one with two twins—feature alfresco showers. All of the rooms have air conditioning, ceiling fans, TVs, and safes. The understated naturalism of their décor inspires profound rest in harmony with the rhythmic waves.

Guests enjoy access to the Pantai Lima Estate amenities, while Echo Beach and Canggu Beach are both within minutes by car. Golfers are less than ten kilometers from Nirwana Bali Golf. Less than twenty kilometers from Ngurah Rai International Airport less, Villa Melissa is an excellent choice for destination wedding guests or hassle-free family reunions.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Please note: Villa Canggu South is connected to Villa Canggu North and they can be booked alongside each other to make up Canggu Estate.

Discover a surprisingly sophisticated retreat in a tiny fishing village at Villa Canggu South. Located just steps from up-and-coming Nelayan Beach, this luxury Bali vacation rental is a modern oasis in a tranquil setting. Use the four bedrooms—and the attentive staff—for a getaway with friends and family, or rent the villa along with its sister property to host a special event or intimate tropical wedding.

During your holiday at Villa Canggu South, a chef, housekeeper, butler, villa manager and others will see to your needs, and you can arrange for a car and driver at extra cost. Spend your stay soaking in the sun on a lounger by the pool, challenging fellow guests at the ping-pong table or taking a few quiet moments to just breathe in the reading and meditation loft. Finish a day of relaxing or sightseeing with a cool drink from the bar and a local specialty from the barbecue, best sipped or tasted at the al-fresco dining area.

Designed to maximize natural light and encourage the flow of cool breezes, the villa’s interiors feature wide glass doors, gallery-like white walls and clean-lined furnishings. Tufted tan sofas and ottomans bring in soft texture in the living room, and in the dining area, plush velour settees offer seating for eight. If you’d like to do some of your own cooking (or just have a snack between meals), there is a fully equipped, state-of-the-art kitchen with a breakfast bar.

Each of the four bedrooms at Villa Canggu South has a king bed and en-suite bathroom. Adults will appreciate the honeymoon suite-style jetted tubs in two of the bedrooms, and for convenience, three of the suites have beds that can be separated into two twins, so kids can share the rooms. As in the main living areas, the bedrooms are decorated with vibrant contemporary artwork that adds color and personality.

Though the villa feels like your own private hideaway, it’s just a 1-minute walk from Nelayan Beach, popular with surfers, and a short drive from Canggu Beach, Echo Beach and Batu Bolong. Stroll the beaches to find everything from yoga studios and boutiques to live music venues and oceanfront restaurants, or take an afternoon or two to play a round at Nirwana Bali Golf Club, visit the Tanah Lot Sea Temple or test your nerve at Bali Treetop Adventure Park. When it’s time to leave, plan on a 20 km drive from Villa Canggu South to Ngurah Rai International Airport.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Spend quality time with your loved ones in this newly built two-bedroom home in the countryside of Bali’s southwest coast. With five separate pavilions sitting on 1,600 square meters of land, this getaway offers one of the best values of all our villas in Bali. A top tropical holiday destination, the island of Bali offers a welcoming atmosphere, unique culture and stunning beaches.

Soak in the sun on a cushioned chaise lounge alongside the slate-lined swimming pool—you’ll have complete privacy thanks to a lush walled garden and several palm trees. If you need shade, head to the relaxation pavilion, it is stocked with two timber beds, and is the perfect spot for a massage or to get lost in a good book. Other amenities include Wi-Fi access and the use of bicycles.

The open-sided living area features a plush sofa with colorful throw pillows, a vaulted ceiling with fans and views overlooking the pool and garden. Just behind, is a cozy media room/office where you can settle in with a movie in the evenings. You won’t have to worry about cooking—there’s an on-site chef who can whip up popular Asian and Western dishes in the modern kitchen, and you can enjoy your meals in the semi-open-air dining room.

Up to four guests are welcome to stay in the villa’s two bedrooms, making this an ideal romantic getaway, or as a holiday spot for a small family or two couples. Both air-conditioned rooms have king size beds and en-suite bathrooms with alfresco showers, as well as terraces with daybeds.

Nearby the villa is a path leading down to the river and rice fields. Meanwhile, Seseh Beach is just 300 meters away, and Echo Beach is only 9 km from the villa. Golf enthusiasts can head to the renowned greens of the Nirwana Bali Golf Course, and those seeking to do some shopping can get their fill in Seminyak.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

Spend a dreamy holiday within view of the Kohala Mountains at Kamilo 331. Whether you’d like to relax with friends or entertain the extended family, this four-bedroom Big Island vacation rental makes it easy. Spacious indoor and outdoor living areas, plus a location close to beaches, golf, shopping and dining, will set you up nicely for a memorable stay.

This luxury property opens to a generous lanai with shaded al-fresco living and dining areas, a barbecue, a sunny terrace with loungers, and a swimming pool and hot tub. After a day by the pool or on the beach, a smart TV, wine cooler and Wi-Fi will help you unwind before bed. For your comfort and convenience, the villa also has air conditioning, ceiling fans and laundry facilities.

At the heart of Kamilo 331 is a perfectly Hawaiian great room, with a slide-away glass wall leading to the lanai and an open-concept sitting area, dining area and fully equipped kitchen. A ceiling of woven panels paired with a color scheme of cream and blue creates a simple, stylish vibe.

There are three bedrooms in the villa’s main house and one in the guest house, or ohana. In the main house, there are two bedrooms with king beds, including a master suite that opens to its own furnished terrace, and one bedroom with two twin beds. The guest house has a second master suite with a king bed, perfect for a couple wanting honeymoon-style privacy. All four bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms.

Guests are welcome to use the shared pools, barbecue areas and fitness center in the Kamilo private community, as well as the beach club at the nearby Mauna Lani Resort. The villa is within walking distance of restaurants and shops, so you can dine out or pick up something for the barbecue, and less than a 3-mile drive from the nearest golf course and beach.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

The spacious and luxurious Kipuka Lani is a private vacation villa created to embrace the beautiful Hawaiian environment of the Mauna Lani Estate. With four bedrooms, all with king beds and en-suite bathrooms, this villa is the perfect home for a family vacation or golf trip with friends. Located just a short walk from the course and the beach, Kipuka Lani is in a prime location, while maintaining a private and secluded atmosphere.

Respect for nature has always been an important part of Hawaiian culture, and Kipuka makes it very easy to appreciate. To accentuate the fresh ocean breeze and natural sunlight of Mauna Lani, Kipuka has been designed with large openings on both sides of its open concept great room. The simple beam and post construction allows rich wooden building materials to open the massive vaulted interior space and create a warm, inviting ambience. Decorated with modern designer furniture, elegant lighting, and plenty of space to socialize, Kipuka is ideal for hosting. The kitchen is stocked with high-end appliances and a breakfast bar with seating for five. And, beside the kitchen is the formal dining area, featuring space for eight.

Outside, relax under the sun in one of the furnished living areas, sun beds, or lounge chairs on the terrace. Go for an afternoon swim in the refreshing swimming pool. Later, count the stars while gathered around the fire pit, or while soaking in Kipuka’s calming hot tub. Back inside, guest will enjoy satellite television, Wi-Fi, a Sonos sound system, and air conditioning in the media room and all of the bedrooms.

Within the Mauna Lani Estate, you’ll have access to their private beach club and sandy beachfront. For the athletes in your group, there’s a tennis and fitness club, also within walking distance. Mauna Lani’s two championship golf courses feature beautifully scenic and challenging holes. And, it’s the annual host of the PGA’s Hawaii State Open.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

Hawaii Tax ID #080-059-3920-01

listing.listing_description:
Swing above the pool in a sunbed while gazing out over the lush canopy of Bali’s southern tip. Embrace a relaxing, Bohemian lifestyle at this open-air hilltop home with a full-staff on-hand to make your vacation a breeze. Watch the sunset from the green-rooftop patio or the shady pergola on the opposite side of the pool. At night, drive into Kuta for dinner, shopping, and beachfront bars.

Villa Moso is artistic, unique, and architecturally-one with its beautiful surroundings, all at the same time. Flow from inside to out, barrier-free with numerous floor-to-ceiling openings. Explore the interior, and you’ll find pieces of art, furniture, and design traits that will inevitably come up during dinner conversation. After you’ve eaten, whip up a few cocktails at the kitchen’s marble bar and shoot a round of pool while you sip. On quieter evenings, curl up for a good movie in the media room or keep up with your fitness routine in the home gym. After a workout, treat yourself to a few minutes in the sauna.

Start your morning with a stroll along the beach, which you’ll find several within a 20-minute drive. Let the waves inspire you and sign-up for a surfing lesson on Kuta or Dreamland beach; both are favorites among local surfers. If surfing’s not your style, check out Pasir Putih for a snorkeling class, or, relax on the sand with a tropical juice from one of the beach bars.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Situated on Lake Wakatipu’s North-East hillside, The Views has a perfect vantage point of the calm lake and The Remarkables Mountain range. Whether you’re in town for golf, skiing, or just to enjoy the unique atmosphere, Queenstown is a beautiful city with plenty to offer. The Views is a three-bedroom luxury rental with a great location and easy access to Queenstown’s many nearby attractions.

Nearly every bit of The Views mountain-facing walls are constructed with floor-to-ceiling glass, easily framing the picturesque mountain views. The open-concept interior is decorated with plush designer furniture, stainless steel appliances, and rugged stone accent walls. The ambiance is modern and slightly minimalistic, making it easy to appreciate the thoughtfully chosen decor and dynamic natural environment.

Upon arrival, you’ll have garage parking and extra space in the driveway. You may notice the hot tub, barbecue, and alfresco dining area on your way inside. Once inside, The Views is equipped with Wi-Fi, Sky TV, and iPod docking station. The kitchen features an espresso machine, dishwasher, and a breakfast bar. There’s a formal dining area with space for eight. After dinner, curl up in the media room for a movie or lounge by the fireplace. When it’s time for bed, the luxuriously outfitted master boasts a king sized bed, en-suite bathroom, and a private balcony. The other two-bedrooms feature either a king or queen sized bed, share a hall bathroom and have direct access to the private balcony. And, all three-bedrooms have soaring mountain views.

Look across the Lake to the West, and you’ll see the Queenstown Golf Course, featuring eighteen-holes, on what is regarded to be one of the most scenic courses on the planet. If you’re looking for alpine excitement, Coronet Peak, and The Remarkables ski areas are both within thirty-kilometers. And, just eight-minutes up the lake shore, you’ll find Queenstown’s downtown area, where shops, restaurants, nightlife, and the Skyline Casino await.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Lake, mountains and sky are on full display at Fifteen. Seen through the windows of this sleek contemporary estate, the scenery fills the open-plan living spaces, forming an unforgettable backdrop to a stay with friends or family. And if you’d like to get out and explore the panoramas up close, you’ll find that the villa’s Aspen Grove setting is only minutes from downtown Queenstown, golf and skiing.

Beautifully appointed outdoor living spaces with sitting and dining areas, a barbecue, a fire pit and a heated hot tub invite you to savor the fresh air. On cooler evenings, set the mood with the indoor sound system, cozy up to the fireplace or a favorite show on TV, or share the best snaps of your holiday via Wi-Fi.

Clean lines, nearly wall-to-wall windows and an open plan give Fifteen an air of decidedly contemporary luxury. Both the living room and the fully equipped kitchen open to lake views on one side and outdoor living areas on the other, giving them a breezy, laid-back feel. But alongside the relaxed layout are classic modern pieces, from the Eames lounger by the fireplace and upholstered dining chairs to the flat-fronted kitchen cabinets.

The master suite at this South Island vacation rental has a king bed and a private en-suite bathroom. The other two bedrooms each have queen beds and share a Jack and Jill bathroom. All three, however, are well appointed with luxe linens and feature gorgeous lake and mountain views.

Whether you’re in New Zealand with family, friends or on honeymoon, you’ll find plenty to see and do around Fifteen. The villa is about a 10-minute drive or less from shopping and dining in central Queenstown, plus attractions ranging from the serene botanical gardens to the yacht club and casino. Golf is also a short drive away, as are the ski areas of Coronet Peak and The Remarkables.

listing.listing_description:
Step into your own slice of Balinese heaven with this luxury villa, which offers considered architecture, distinct style and premium outfitting. Vivid color will flavor a stay here, with lush lawns, sapphire wrap-around pool, and dark wood interiors. A stone bathtub, poolside hammock, and artful sliding doors add a special touch, with Canggu town, surfing beaches and pura temples all nearby.

Take in the bright sun shining down through palm fronds while sipping a cool drink at Villa Nonnavana’s poolside beach hut. The verdant trees and shrubs of the garden make for a peaceful green sanctuary, with the home’s curtain wall ensuring total privacy while grilling fresh seafood or produce on the top-tier barbecue. Inside, woven land shades hang in the ample vertical space of this modern and uncluttered villa, with a fully-equipped kitchen and chic furniture making for a pleasant mix of domesticity and tastefulness. The inventive cot and bunk-bed features are ideal for children, with ensuite bedrooms offering direct access to the pool and garden.

From Villa Nonnavana, guests can easily access the best of the locality. The fabled sands and surfers’ paradises of Echo Beach and Batu Bolong are just a short car ride away. Cafes, bars and traditional Balinese eateries are within walking distance of the home, while Canggu town offers happening nightlife and clubbing. Visit the serene Tanah Lot temple to take in the breaking waves by golden sunset, or rent a bike, pedaling through quiet rice fields to a relaxing day spa.

 

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Villa Florimar is a stunning private home near Seminyak on the island of Bali, situated within easy walking distance of Seseh Beach. The villa balances exquisite contemporary comforts with a vintage Balinese elegance, consisting of multiple open-air pavilions set amid lush, tropical gardens. Superb amenities include an infinity swimming pool, gourmet kitchen, beautiful living and dining areas, and excellent media features. Five king bedroom suites (including two in separate guest pavilions) accommodate ten travelers in total comfort—ideal for families, destination wedding guests, corporate retreats, or large groups of friends. Your vacation rental includes complimentary chef, butler, security, and housekeeping services.

The estate forms an expansive, cloistered setting by the sea, with ample room for ceremonies, celebrations, or peaceful relaxation. Dip into the gem-toned pool and sip cool drinks under elegant parasols. Luxuriate on the fabulous sectional lounge bed, or relax over games in a poolside pavilion. Gather for home-cooked feasts at the open-air table, and linger outdoors amid the enchanting lighting, sipping glasses of wine under the starry sky.

Open walls create a graceful flow of space and air between the pavilions and yard, infusing every moment with the breath of the gardens and sea. The cavernous main pavilion features soaring, vaulted ceilings, floors of polished black stone, and sumptuous furniture overlooking the pool. A lovely stepping stone path leads across a pond to the dining pavilion. The villa is equipped with Wi-Fi, cable TV, and a Sonos sound system, and the kitchen features professional-grade appliances for your private chef.

There are three suites in the main house and two located in individual pavilions. All feature air conditioning, safes, and ensuite bathrooms, four of which include soaking tubs. Both the master suite and primary guest suite enjoy beautiful sea views, and the master includes a private lounge. The guest pavilions feature superb, open-concept bathrooms and private terraces.

Villa Florimar balances exquisite privacy with convenient access to some of the finest destinations in Bali. In addition to Seseh Beach, you’re within easy reach of Echo Beach, Tanah Lot Temple, Nirwana Bali Golf Club, and the famed beaches and nightlife of Seminyak.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Villa Hana is the brainchild of famed Australian designer and architect Stuart Membery, who created this masterful four-bedroom villa in Bali with such grace and forethought that some parts of the home seem to blend in seamlessly with the tropical surroundings. Villa Hana has room for eight guests or six adults and four children, who will revel in the estate’s unique style and many amenities. Minutes away from Echo Beach in the Canggu district, Villa Hana is the ideal place to stay while experiencing this amazing island.

Children and adults alike are always big fans of both the fifty-foot swimming pool as well the media room with a 52-inch television, gaming console and DVD library. Whether you are lounging on the daybeds or enjoying a barbeque at the alfresco dining set, you will no doubt feel at peace in the tranquil and picturesque grounds. Additionally, the home features Wi-Fi and is surrounded by manicured tropical gardens attended by the estate’s artistic gardener. The villa is staffed with round-the-clock security guards, a butler and chef.

The home’s walls feature portions that are made up entirely of natural stone set against tall tropical palm trees making the interior of the home very similar to the grounds located outside. A minimalist color-scheme of largely white contrasted with bold black door frames and entryways produces a dramatic effect. The walls have been adorned with fascinating murals that provoke excellent dinner conversation over the grand dining table.

Villa Hana’s four en-suite bedrooms are all lavish in decor and amenities, including features such as air conditioning and flat-screen televisions. All the rooms have been equipped with plush king size beds, with the exception of the four-bunk room. The master suite additionally boasts an aristocratic dressing room and a private tropical garden.

Life moves at a slower pace in pastoral Canggu as many locals have largely agrarian lifestyles. Excitement is within arms reach however, starting with Echo Beach lined with warungs, small traditional restaurants, and excellent waves for surfing. Just a couple of miles away, Finns Recreation Club, provides guests with a refined setting to partake in jovial social events and fitness facilities including fun activities for the tykes. Get the vacation you deserve in Bali with Luxury Retreats!

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Brilliant orange blossoms dangle over a daybed on the terrace of this curvy-walled contemporary retreat. The villa’s modern architecture, from its concave glass to its convex pool, echoes the slopes of the lush Bali hills around it. Drive the 6 kilometers over the hills, and you’ll discover the white sands of Pandawa, one of the island’s so-called secret beaches and a beautiful spot for swimming.

 

Untamed forest meets clean lines at the villa’s infinity pool, which lines the edge of a furnished terrace. The outdoor living areas also feature a sound system, barbecue, and a traditional Indonesian bale pavilion, a circle of shade that’s made for reading or napping. Your holiday here includes the services of a butler, housekeeper, and villa manager, as well as daily breakfast.

 

An open-sided great room feels like an extension of the terrace—and has panoramic views over the treetops. The curving sofa fits neatly into the walls of the living area, a dining area in front of the pool seats 10, and the adjacent kitchen is fully equipped.

 

This vacation rental has 3 bedrooms with queen beds, en-suite bathrooms, and air conditioning. Two of the bedrooms afford you the luxury of reliving your honeymoon in private hot tubs, and one has its own balcony too.

 

A short drive over the South Kuta hills will bring you to Pandawa Beach, but you can also head in the opposite direction to reach Jimbaran Beach, where you can try out surfing or indulge in seafood at an oceanfront restaurant. Golfers will appreciate the two courses within a short drive, while those looking for an only-in-Bali experience can visit the nearby Uluwatu Sea Temple to watch the dramatic kecak fire dance. If you’re traveling as a family, take the kids for a day on the slides of Waterbom Bali.

 

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Step into the tropical embrace of Bali’s southern coast with this premium villa close to Batu Bolong beach. Step out onto the airy terrace to take in views of the nearby rice fields, before diving into the vivid pool. From the sun recliners, take in the bold, vertical design of the home, before relaxing in the plush and ornate interiors, with the beaches of Canggu just minutes away.

Richness is the defining word for Villa Kayajiwa, which guests awakening to a villa that is both ideally located, and decorated to an exceptional degree. The royal themes that run through the regal-feeling sitting room and passages of the home are punctuated by the vibrant green flash of tropical plants and hanging trees, helping to bring guests more in touch with the island’s wilderness. Rich, wooden panelling dominates the home, while the shaded outdoor areas are both private and indulgently comfortable, with no expense spared in outfitting and style. Wander ornate stone pathways, or luxuriate amidst the leather and jade tiling of the impressive bathrooms. With a fantastic choice of group dining spaces, the fun-loving lights and relaxed vibe of the villa’s karaoke room is a favorite with guests.

With its proximity to the fabled beaches of Bali, Villa Kayajia makes a fantastic choice for those looking to both relax in fine surroundings and make the most of some of the finest beaches in this part of the world. Guests can simply take a 5 minute walk to Batu Bolong Beach, which offers open sands, stunning sun and great surroundings. The surfer’s mecca that is Echo Beach is similarly a short walk away. The buzzing restaurants and bars of the beach district offer a huge number of chill-out and relaxation spots, while the distinct heritage of the area is best typified via nearby sites like Tanah Lot, a Hindu temple suspended on a rocky outcrop surrounded by crashing blue waves.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Shotover Point is an enchanting luxury home outside Queenstown on the South Island of New Zealand, an easy drive from Coronet Peak and The Remarkables ski areas. Nestled amid vineyards along the Shotover River, the converted antique farmhouse balances rustic alpine charm with superb modern comforts and amenities, including an outdoor hot tub, a gourmet kitchen, and excellent media features. Ample interior and outdoor living areas form a comfortable haven in any season—a perfect home-base for outdoor sport enthusiasts or destination wedding guests. Three spacious bedroom suites with ensuite bathrooms accommodate families and groups of friends up to six in size.

The open-concept great room forms the heart of the home, with high ceilings, exposed timber beams, and a large open fireplace. The kitchen is fully equipped with chef-grade appliances and generous prep space, and serves a lovely dining table for eight. Comfortable lounge sofas face the fireplace and TV, ideal for toasty evenings or quiet afternoons. The historic home has maintained much of its vintage artistry, with superb stonework, rough-hewn wood, and wrought-iron accents. Thick walls, abundant natural light, underfloor heating, and a strategic orientation create a comfortable interior ambiance.

Glass doors open wide to the spacious deck, inviting beautiful views and fresh air into the home. The terrace invites you to relax and celebrate in the open air—relishing alfresco meals, sipping locally produced wine by the fire, or crawling into the hot tub for a soothing soak under the sublime sky.

The villa's master suite features a king bed, walk-in closet, desk, and ensuite bathroom with dual vanity and shower. Each of the guestrooms has a queen bed and ensuite bathroom, and one includes a pullout sofa for an additional guest. One of the guestrooms has a private lounge, and another opens to a private terrace.

Beyond the exquisite seclusion of Shotover Point, you're about twenty kilometers from the region's two major ski resorts; fourteen kilometers from Queenstown Golf Course; and ten kilometers form the shops and nightlife in the town center. Queenstown Airport is just seven minutes away.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
This beautiful Hawaiian villa is situated on the south shore of Maui near Kalepolepo Beach Park. Bordering undeveloped state conversation land, the villa enjoys unobstructed, 180-degree views of Maalaea Bay and the vast Pacific. A contemporary architectural gem, it includes 5,700 square feet of interior space, a 1,300-square foot lanai, and an expansive pool terrace nestled amid lush palms and gardens. The property has five spacious bedroom suites.

The terrace features a saltwater swimming pool with elevated spa, from which guests can gaze upon a sublime panorama of Haleakala volcano and the famous Maui sunset. Comfortable loungers and charming pendant sunbeds invite you to bask in the open air after a refreshing plunge.

A 21-foot-wide, folding glass wall fuses the terrace and interior, where a sumptuous lounge is arranged for TV watching or horizon gazing, and a dining table welcomes ocean-view feasts. A gourmet kitchen surveys the space, with leathered quartize marble countertops, chef-grade stainless steel appliances, a wet bar, and a wine fridge. At once rustic and progressively contemporary, the interior décor features Belgian limestone tile and custom French oak floors, while top-of-the-line smart-home technology includes Lutron black-out shades, a Heos Home Audio System, and video surveillance, all easily controlled with a personal device.

A floating staircase leads to the master suite and three guest suites upstairs. All of these main-house bedrooms enjoy gorgeous vistas of the ocean and volcano, and three of them open to the balcony. The master and primary guest suites have king beds, while the other two have queens. All of the bedrooms are air conditioned and enjoy ensuite bathrooms.

While offering extraordinary serenity and seclusion, the villa is conveniently located near the shops and nightlife at Kihei and Wailea, while a Safeway grocery is close by for stocking up on food for the group. Kalepolepo Beach Park is just a minute's drive away, while several other renowned beaches are within three to ten miles. Just eleven miles from Kahului Airport, the villa is a convenient choice for hassle-free getaways or destination wedding guests.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Slow down to the pace of the clouds moving across the mountains—or seek adventure on their slopes at Lordens Penthouse. Nestled into a hillside just outside Queenstown, this South Island vacation rental affords panoramic views across Lake Wakatipu and a location close to ski slopes, golf and more. Let the scenery that inspired the Lord of the Rings films and countless other works of art inspire a holiday that’s as active or quiet as you like.

The penthouse opens to a gorgeous glass-railed balcony with loungers facing the lake, a barbecue and al-fresco dining for eight. On cooler days, soak in the private outdoor hot tub, set back from the main balcony, or cozy up inside around the fireplace, satellite television, sound system and Wi-Fi.

Inside, the villa is laid out around an open-concept great room that stretches the width of the balcony and has nearly wall-to-wall windows showcasing the views. In the sitting area, soft gray sofas get a pop of color from coral cushions, while in the dining area, a sleek white table seats eight. The adjacent kitchen is stylish and modern, with glossy white cabinets and a minimalist look, but is also fully equipped and has a convenient breakfast bar.

Each of the three bedrooms at this luxury property has an en-suite bathroom and private balcony. There are two bedrooms with king beds, including a honeymoon-worthy master suite with a fireplace, and one bedroom with a queen bed.

Lordens Penthouse is less than 24 km from the Coronet Peak and The Remarkables ski areas, Queenstown Golf Course and Wakatipu Yacht Club, giving you a choice of activities year-round. Bring the family to Skyline Queenstown for a scenic gondola ride followed by a thrilling luge, discover the shops and restaurants of downtown Queenstown or enjoy a night out at the casino.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

Give your family vacation or special occasion aloha spirit at Kamilo at Mauna Lani 321. Set in the private Kamilo community, the villa gives you access to amenities like a huge shared pool and barbecue pavilion, plus the perks of the Mauna Lani Resort. With views of the mountains and a golf course, high-end finishes and three spacious bedrooms, the villa is both beautiful and comfortable—much like Hawaii itself.

Thanks to fully retractable pocket doors, the villa’s great room opens completely to an inviting covered lanai with a dining area, lounge chairs and a built-in gas barbecue. Step off the lanai to the sunny terrace, which has more lounge chairs for sunbathing, a pool and a hot tub. For more outdoor space, head to the Kamilo community’s shared pool, fitness center and barbecue pavilion. Villa guests also enjoy access the Mauna Lani beach club, golf course, tennis courts and spa.

Kamilo at Mauna Lani 321 is laid out around a central great room, which uses a traditional tropical palette and modern lines to create an airy, refined space. Dark wood furniture is paired with cream upholstery in the sitting and dining areas as a nod to island style, and a grasscloth-covered vaulted ceiling adds warmth to the open room. The fully equipped kitchen has a more contemporary feel, with glossy stone countertops, stainless steel appliances and an island with a breakfast bar.

Each of the villa’s three bedrooms has an en-suite bathroom. The master suite has a king bed, walk-in closet and a terrace with lounge chairs perfect for a mid-morning nap or nighttime stargazing. A second bedroom also has a king bed, and the third bedroom has a queen bed and walk-in closet. As in the great room, dark wood furnishings, neutral-toned carpets and walls and accents like palm-print bedding or grasscloth-covered ceilings give the bedrooms tropical style with a modern twist.

From the Kamilo community, it’s just a 15-minute walk to the restaurants, shops and grocery store at Mauna Lani. Take the car for the 5-minute drive to the Mauna Lani beach club and fitness center or the Francis H. I’i Brown Golf Course, or the 12-minute drive to Hapuna Beach. Spend an afternoon at Waimea, 18 miles away, or Waikoloa, 29 miles away. At the end of your stay, plan on a 22-mile drive from the villa to Kona International Airport.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Carved out of a rocky hillside is a modern, luxury 4-bedroom villa overlooking the Timor Sea in Lombok Indonesia. One of a chain of islands best known for surfing, snorkeling, and reef diving. Bring hiking shoes for the trekking trails here. Lesser known than Bali, it still retains a sense of wild, untouched nature. Downward dog on the terrace to a pastel morning sky. Picnic at the Sendang Gile and Tiu Kelep Waterfalls tucked beneath the foot of Mount Rinjani.

This modern, tastefully furnished villa has a beautiful infinity pool that seems to flow into the sea. A self-contained kitchen serves for dining both inside and out. There’s also an in-house restaurant and bar on the premises that offers room service. Grab the surfboard and hop on the complimentary shuttle to the white sandy beaches and crisp waves of Selong Belanak.

Sitting near the pool after a day of discovering the wooden star at Bukit Selong Rice Fields and capturing the fantastic vistas, relax and enjoy the ever-changing pastel skies. Sign up for the cultural tour to Sasak Sade Village. It’s a real village, not just a tourist spot. 

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

Look out at ocean, golf course, mountain and sunset views at Wai’ula’ula Estate. Part of the exclusive Uplands community at the Mauna Kea Resort, this luxury Big Island vacation rental is poised between gently sloping mountains on one side and lush fairways stretching toward the Pacific on the other. The beautiful setting, convenient location and three suite-style bedrooms mean you can use the villa for a golf getaway with friends, a family holiday on the Kohala Coast or a second honeymoon with your sweetheart.

You’ll approach the villa through the gates of the Hapuna Beach Prince Hotel and enter the house via a pergola-covered doorway in a stone wall. Step through the house and onto the private lanai to discover shaded outdoor sitting and dining areas, a sunny terrace lined with loungers and an infinity pool and hot tub facing the ocean. An outdoor kitchen with a wet bar and barbecue makes light work of meal prep. Guests of the villa also enjoy access to the shared infinity pool and fitness center at the Wai’ula’ula Amenity Center.

Thanks to a fold-away glass wall, the interiors of Wai'ula’ula Estate 411 feel like an extension of the outdoor spaces. Warm breezes flow through the open-plan great room, which has the same stone tile floors as the lanai and raised ceilings paneled with natural-fiber woven screens. Bamboo accent chairs, palm-print rugs and pillows and wingback-inspired dining chairs in cream, taupe and leafy green hues nod to Hawaii’s traditional style while keeping the look fresh and modern. The fully equipped kitchen continues the vibe with matching stone countertops and backsplash and state-of-the-art stainless steel appliances.

Each of the villa’s three bedrooms has an en-suite bathroom and opens to a terrace. The master suite has a king bed, ocean views and an indulgent al-fresco shower; a second bedroom also has a king bed and ocean views. The third bedroom has two twin beds and looks at the “mauka,” or inland, side, toward the slopes of the mountains.

Begin your stay with a flight to Kona International Airport, a 35-minute drive from the villa. Once you’ve come across the ocean to the Mauna Kea Resort, it’s only a 10-minute walk to the Wai’ula’ula Amenity Center and a 5-minute drive to Mauna Kea Beach, Hapuna Beach, the Hapuna Golf clubhouse and the Mauna Kea Golf Course and Resort. Visitors who make the 30-minute drive to Kua Bay Beach will be rewarded by soft white sand and clear water that’s great for snorkeling. Don’t leave the Big Island without at least a glance at the Mauna Kea summit trail, 60 miles away, or the often-active lava flows at Hawaii Volcanoes National Park, 100 miles away.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Indulge in the luxury of outdoor living at Villa Luwih. This spectacular Bali vacation rental has al-fresco spaces perfectly designed for enjoying the ocean views—and indoor spaces you can open to Canggu’s tropical breezes. Its layout is also ideal for groups of friends or extended family on holiday together, and a full staff will ensure that every guest is pampered.

Outside, Villa Luwih has two infinity pools, areas for lounging and dining, and a bar and barbecue; inside, the residence features a media room, Apple TV, a sound system and Wi-Fi. Your stay also includes the services of the villa chef, manager, housekeeper and security staff.

The villa’s glass-fronted rooms, whose edges frame the rolling waves just off Pererenan Beach, feel like a honeymoon from the everyday. Polished stone tile or wood flooring is cool underfoot, plump sofas and wicker chairs are comfortable and inviting, and local artwork lends traditional inspiration. While chef service is included in your stay, there is a fully equipped kitchen with a sleek breakfast bar.

Villa Luwih has five bedrooms with king beds, including one with a lounge area and one with a private semi-outdoor bathroom, and one bedroom with two twin beds. All six bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms and air conditioning (which is not available in the common areas of the residence).

While you could easily spend a week or two luxuriating in the villa’s amenities, the property’s location makes it equally easy to explore the Canggu area. It’s only a 5-minute walk from the villa to Pererenan Beach, and popular Echo and Kuta beaches are only a short drive away. Spend the day playing at Finns Recreation Club, watch the sunset over Tanah Lot Temple or shop and socialize in the popular oceanfront bars in Seminyak.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Enjoy sunsets over the ocean and contemporary design just minutes from downtown Lahaina at Garuda Estate. Sweeping views, open-concept interiors and a great location close to Launiupoko Beach make this modern vacation rental one of the best on Maui. Book its three bedrooms for an island getaway with family or friends, or even a sun-kissed Hawaiian honeymoon.

Watch the sun move across the water from the villa’s private lanai, which features shaded alfresco sitting and dining areas, and opens to an infinity pool. After a day of lounging, swimming or sightseeing, prep freshly caught seafood on the barbecue or indulge in a soak under the stars in the hot tub. Inside, the amenities range from a cable television and sound system to Wi-Fi and a telescope.

There’s plenty of space for everyone to gather in the estate’s open-plan great room. Sunlight pours through the sliding glass doors to the lanai to flood the living and dining areas, and classic island touches such as wood trim and palm prints feel stylish yet welcoming. The adjacent fully equipped kitchen even incorporates a leafy motif into its breakfast bar.

The three bedrooms at this luxury property can accommodate groups of up to six on holiday together. There are two with ensuite bathrooms and one with a shared hall bathroom; all three have king beds, televisions, air conditioning and ceiling fans for warmer nights.

Not only does Garuda Estate boast panoramic ocean views, it’s just over a mile from Launiupoko Beach Park, where you’ll find a family-friendly natural pool enclosed by lava rock. For an array of shopping and dining options, plus golf, water activities and fishing excursions, make the short drive into downtown Lahaina, a bustling town with galleries and a market along the waterfront.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
The sea, boundless and blue, dominates this hilltop villa in the Bay of Islands. It fills the views from the sun-kissed deck and even finds its way indoors, in touches like the kitchen’s sea-green cabinets. Pack a picnic to take down to the beach a half-mile away, or book a helicopter or jet-ski ride for an adrenaline rush along with dramatic coastal scenery.

 

Follow a winding private road to the heights above the Bay of Oneroa—and your own outdoor living areas with a pool, hot tub, lounging and dining furniture, and a barbecue. There’s an espresso machine to fuel all your holiday adventures, and a smart TV and Wi-Fi to help you relax when you return from them.

 

This vacation rental is bordered on 3 sides by a wraparound deck, and a glass wall connects the al-fresco spaces with the indoor great room. Sunlight bounces off the honey-toned wood floors and whitewashed ceiling in the living and dining areas, and sea green cabinets are a soft touch in the fully equipped kitchen and breakfast bar.

 

This luxury property has one honeymoon-worthy master suite with a king bed, en-suite bathroom, and its own terrace. The other 2 bedrooms have a king bed and 2 twin beds, and share access to a hall bathroom, making them ideal for a family traveling with children.

 

From the villa’s perch, it’s a half-mile down the hill to the nearest beach. But your explorations should continue to the nearby town of Russell, where you can stop for lunch or dinner at waterfront cafes and restaurants housed in historic buildings, and Paihia, New Zealand’s first capital and the starting point for your choice of boat cruises, swims with dolphins, and fishing excursions going after the area’s famed black marlin.

 

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
A secluded Balinese oasis with a full staff and driver on hand, Villa Impian Manis takes all the stress out of planning your next relaxing Luxury Retreats getaway. Located in the center of Bali’s Denpasar peninsula, this luxurious three-bedroom is within fifteen-kilometers of the coast on three sides, and the towns of Kuta, Sukawati, and Ubud if you travel inland. Nearby, you’ll find golf, waterparks, ancient temples, nature reserves, and plenty of gorgeous beachfront.

Balinese architecture has always been one of the most open-air friendly disciplines, celebrating the near perfect weather of Bali by inviting it inside. Instantly, the smooth, earthy tones of Impian Manis will have you feeling relaxed. With so many unique living areas scattered throughout the estate, you won’t have any trouble finding the perfect place to sit with friends or lay down for an afternoon nap.

Impian Manis comes outfitted with Wi-Fi, satellite television, and air conditioning to keep you cool and connected during your stay. Chef, Butler housekkeper are available to cater to your needs. The villa features a formal and alfresco dining, a barbecue, and a fully equipped kitchen. Outside, the swimming pool, bale pavilion, and day bed are sure to rejuvenate you and your guests. And, back inside there’s a spa room with massage tables.

Bali is known for its world-class surf, and Bingin Beach, on the island’s west coast, is among the best. A favorite among locals and returning visitors, Binging is a little off the beaten path, so if you’re looking for a secluded spot to work on your tan, this is the place for you. On the southern coast, Pandawa Beach is better for casual swimmers, although surfing is available as well if you swim out past the reef. Pandawa is hidden by massive limestone cliffs and features many shops, restaurants, and activities along its sandy coast. And, if there’s a golfer in the group, Bali National Golf Course is a straight shot east, about twelve-kilometers. There, you’ll find dynamic landscapes that create a challenging course, as well as showcase incredible ocean views.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Tranquil waters lap in the foreground and snow-capped peaks rise in the background at Kohanga Lakeside Villa. This spectacular South Island vacation rental is on the shores of Lake Wakatipu, close to skiing, golf and the attractions of central Queenstown. Its spacious interiors and four bedrooms mean you can invite up to eight friends or family members to enjoy the sublime setting.

Start the morning with a coffee on the lakefront balcony, which has a sitting area and a glass railing for uninterrupted views; later on, follow the steps down to the lake or relax on a lower-level terrace with a barbecue and hot tub. In the evenings, unwind inside with the help of the satellite television, sound system, Wi-Fi and wine fridge.

An open-plan layout, wall-to-wall windows and pale wood floors lend a bright, airy feel to the spacious great room of this luxury villa. The chic, mid-century-influenced sitting and dining areas are next to the glass; open the sliding doors to the terrace for a breeze off the lake. The fully equipped kitchen has its own stunning views as well as a breakfast bar and state-of-the-art appliances.

The master suite at Kohanga Lakeside Villa has a king bed, en-suite bathroom and its own private balcony. There’s a second bedroom with a queen bed and en-suite bathroom, as well as two bedrooms with king beds that share a bathroom. The latter two beds can be converted to two twin beds for more flexible accommodations during your holiday.

The beauty of the villa’s setting is rivaled only by its convenience. In snowy weather, make the short drive to The Remarkables and Coronet Peak ski areas; in warmer temperatures, it’s an easy ride to the Queenstown golf course. Spend a day exploring the shops and restaurants in central Queenstown, or an evening at its casino or on a honeymoon-style cruise around the lake.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Please note, this villa is located on Nusa Lembongan island, which is approximately a 35 minute ferry ride from Sanur, Bali.

This superb beachfront villa is situated on the island of Lembongan, southeast of Bali, with spectacular, panoramic views of the Badung Straights and Devil’s Tear. The Bali-based Italian architect Valentina Audrito designed the home, balancing ancient Balinese influences with contemporary lines and high-end luxury amenities for cooking, dining, and relaxation. Consisting of a four-bedroom main house and a secluded, stand-alone master bedroom pavilion, the villa is ideal for family reunions, destination wedding guests, and groups of friends up to eleven in size. Your vacation rental includes talented chef services, a butler, housekeeping, and security.

The waterfront terrace is ideal for festive gatherings or serene relaxation under the open sky. A beautiful swimming pool with ample tanning shelf stretches from the villa toward the sea, flanked by lovely bean-cushion loungers. A fabulous wet bar with canopy serves the plentiful sitting areas, while a fire pit warms the seaside lounge—an ideal theater for admiring the stars.

The breezy living room forms an exquisite space for quiet afternoons or nighttime festivities, with high ceilings, ample windows, beautiful bamboo blinds, and exquisite teak wood surfaces. A cool veranda with polished pebble floors extends from the interior, featuring a dining table for ten, while the elevated platform features a superb, triangular wet bar. Air conditioning ensures a comfortable ambiance throughout the villa.

A stepping stone path leads through the garden to the master pavilion. An enchanting private getaway for a couple, this suite features a king bed, private balcony, lounge area, TV, and superb ensuite bathroom with dual vanity, freestanding tub, and shower. In the main house, all four bedrooms feature king beds and open to the terrace, and the two primary guest suites enjoy ocean views. There is a kid-friendly room with three twin beds, and a converted media room with additional bedding. All of the rooms have well-appointed ensuite bathrooms.

The villa is a short walk from Sandy Bay Beach Club (an excellent choice for cocktails) and Dream Beach, while the swimmer-friendly Mushroom Bay Beach is about a mile away. Harumaya Day Spa and the fine dining at Cliff Park Lembongan are also within minutes.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Feel the sea breeze from the master bedroom, in the living room, and everywhere else at this open-air villa. On the main floor, semi-separate areas are linked by curved walls, allowing each space to display its own character without distracting from the open atmosphere. Outside, clean, straight lines show off Witta Circle’s modern side, especially when set against mature palm trees, blue waters, and the other natural beauties of Australia. Inside, relax upon contemporary furniture, get creative in the kitchen, and pamper yourself in the ensuites.

Bring a fishing rod and cast a line off the jetty of this canalside home in Noosa Sound to see if you can catch your dinner. Better yet, rent yourself a boat and fish a little further out. After you’ve docked, fire up the grill while the kids play in the pool before dinner. Then, enjoy your catch at the alfresco setting as the sun fades into the ocean view. Later, walk to Hastings Street and check out the local bars. 

Throw on your hiking boots and hit the many trails of Noosa. From the stunning lookouts of the National Park, on to the volcanic dome of Mount Coolum, and down to the beautiful river walkways, Noosa is packed with scenic trails. If you’d rather spend your time on the water, fishing, kayaking, and paddleboarding are all easily accessible activities along the riverfront. And, when you’re ready for the sand, Sunrise and Sunshine beaches are both just a few minutes from home. 

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Experience Bali like never before at the one-of-a-kind Villa 1880. This incredible Seminyak retreat was designed by an interior designer and vintage store owner to be their own tropical paradise. You’ll soon come to share their vision as you and your family or friends relax in the beautifully designed courtyard, reconnect amid an eclectic collection of furnishings and artwork, and let yourselves be pampered by the friendly staff.

Your holiday at Villa 1880 includes the services of a chef, butler, housekeeper, property manager and security guards. It’s up to you whether to spend your days lazing in the 19-meter saltwater pool, challenging others to an al-fresco game of table tennis or snacking on delicacies from the barbecue on the rooftop terrace. The villa also has its own private spa room, wine fridge, sound system, TV and Wi-Fi.

This luxury property is made up of a 19th-century plantation house surrounded by two modern structures. The open-sided living and dining areas are adjacent to the pool and filled with a thoughtful assortment of pieces—think modern armchairs, vintage barstools and even a stuffed peacock. Though chef service is part of your stay, there is a fully equipped kitchen with a convenient breakfast bar.

This exquisite vacation rental has four bedrooms with king beds and en-suite bathrooms, including one on its own floor for honeymoon-worthy privacy. The fifth bedroom is a children’s room with four bunk beds and an en-suite bathroom.

From the villa’s location on the northern edge of Seminyak, it’s a 10-minute walk to Batu Belig Beach. It’s popular with surfers, but if you’re not keen to ride, you can still enjoy the surf from the comfort of one of the trendy beach bars along the sand. It’s also a 10-minute drive from Villa 1880 to an array of restaurants, shops and bars, including those in Seminyak and Canggu.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Relax in a sublime setting at Villa Cantik Pandawa. This gorgeous Bali vacation rental near Pandawa Beach, whose name translates to “beautiful,” lives up to that promise with panoramic ocean views, well-designed outdoor living areas and multi-level spaces for entertaining and unwinding. Invite up to twelve friends or family members to your very own tropical paradise.

During your holiday at Villa Cantik, five butlers will wait on you (and cook for you) and a knowledgeable villa manager can answer any questions. Lounge in the sunshine by the upper-level infinity pool, which spills over into a second pool adjoining an open-sided bar, games room and dining area with seating for twenty. Other villa amenities include an exercise room and dedicated massage space.

With more than 18,000 square feet of living space, this luxury property has plenty of room for both socializing and relaxing in private. Steal away to tranquil corners like the garden gazebo or the water features in the entryway or gather the whole group in an open-concept great room with sitting and dining areas and a fully equipped kitchen. The classic Balinese vaulted ceiling and a row of glass doors connect the space to the terrace for a seamless indoor-outdoor living area.

Each of the six bedrooms at Villa Cantik has a king bed and en-suite bathroom. The master bedroom also has honeymoon-suite-worthy features like an al-fresco shower and a balcony overlooking the ocean, and several other bedrooms open to either a balcony or terrace.

A location on the Bukit Peninsula at the southern tip of Bali makes Villa Cantik Pandawa feel delightfully far away from it all. But in spite of its peaceful, secluded setting, the property is only a 10-minute walk from the white-sand Pandawa Beach and a short drive from the Pandawa Beach Country Club. Don’t miss a show depicting traditional life at the nearby Nusa Dua Theater or a sunset dance performance at the striking Uluwatu temple.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Be one with nature at this Balinese-style, open-air villa overlooking the Byron Bay Hinterland in Possum Creek, Australia. Feel the warm sun and late-afternoon breeze while you catch up on some reading beneath the shaded gazebo. Hop into the saltwater swimming for a quick refresh before dinner. Then, head to Three Blue Ducks, an award-winning restaurant that highlights local produce.

Nearly every inch of Bodhi Nature’s perimeter is covered with floor-to-ceiling windows and doors. When open, the warm-wooded interior feels more like a gazebo than a house, which is perfect in Australia. Pamper yourself with spa-like fixtures in the ensuites. Stay connected with Smart TV and Wi-Fi. And, let the fully equipped kitchen and backyard barbecue inspire your culinary creativity.

Start your morning with a stroll around the property, espresso in-hand. Enjoy the fragrant sub-tropical garden. Then, walk down to the creek, where a rock pool forms the perfect seat beneath a gentle waterfall. In the afternoon, pick sun lounger and work on that golden vacation tan. When it cools off at night, settle into the living room and set the mood with a fire.

If you’re looking adventure, Byron Bay has lots of watersport options on the beach, which is about 20 minutes from home. Kite surfing and kayaking are local favorites, and tours and lessons are readily available. Rather keep dry? Put on your hiking boots and hit the trails on Tyagarah Nature Reserve. And, if you’re looking for city life, the Gold Coast’s downtown core is about an hour away.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Sculpture and stone gild the open spaces of this penthouse perched above Melbourne’s Parkville area. Laid out over the top 2 floors of the Arcadia building, this apartment boasts views indoors and out, thanks to floor-to-ceiling windows and colorful artwork, and at night, its expanses of marble change under mood lighting. It’s less than 10 minutes to Queen Victoria market and museums. 

Your holiday at the penthouse begins with an airport transfer and includes concierge service throughout. Once settled in, take in city skyline panoramas from a private balcony with a gas barbecue and alfresco dining for 8. Pour a glass of an Australian vintage from the wine fridge to sip while watching the smart TV or browsing over Wi-Fi, or host a family movie night in a media room with a projector and screen. 

Designed by local firm Fender Katsalidis Architects, the curving building has a contemporary look, and this luxury apartment plays into that with an open-concept great room clad in polished finishes. A wood panel separates the living area from a dining table for 8, and a breakfast bar sits at the entrance to a fully equipped, marble-splashed kitchen. 

There are 3 bedrooms with king beds at this vacation rental: 2 with ensuite bathrooms, including a master bedroom with honeymoon-suite-worthy details like wall-to-wall city views and a jetted tub, and 1 with access to a hall bathroom. There’s also 1 bedroom with a queen bed and ensuite bathroom. 

Grab a coffee from one of the city’s famously great spots and set off for the 1-minute walk to the Royal Park Golf Course or the 8-minute trip on foot to the park-like Melbourne Zoo. By car, it’s less than 10 minutes to must-sees like the Melbourne Museum and Carlton Gardens, Queen Victoria Market, and the Immigration Museum.

If you plan to ring in the new year, a nice touch to your trip will be the opportunity to marvel over the city's fireworks display, from the home.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Vines spill over the rooftops and palm fronds shield the rooms from view at this contemporary Bali villa just minutes from the beach. The lush thicket of plants creeping into the home is a contrast to its clean-lined, glass-walled rooms, where sunlight bounces off white cabinets and polished floors. Drive 4 minutes to black-sand Pererenan Beach for surfing, sunset watching, and horseback riding.

Your holiday at this vacation rental begins with an airport transfer and includes daily breakfast, as well as the services of housekeepers and a live-in villa manager. Listen to the birds calling from flowering trees as you lie back in a sun lounger by the swimming pool, get the whole family to name the fish in the koi pond, and heat up the charcoal barbecue for dinner at the alfresco table for 6. The villa also has a media room, satellite-equipped smart TV, integrated sound system, and Wi-Fi.

Fold-away glass walls and verdant landscaping bring the outdoors inside this luxury property, while white walls and large-scale artwork add a gallery-like feel. A driftwood coffee table is the focal point of the living area, while pendant lights lend a warm glow over a dining table for 8 and the breakfast bar in the fully equipped kitchen.

Each of the 5 bedrooms at this villa has a king bed, ensuite bathroom, air conditioning, and access to the outdoors, whether a garden, courtyard, or private balcony. Two of the bedrooms also have alfresco showers, including a honeymoon-worthy master suite that also has its own lounge area.

The property is a 4-minute drive from Pererenan Beach, where experienced riders can try the surf break or you can book a sunset horseback ride. It’s also a 3-minute drive from the town of Pererenan, where you’ll find shopping and dining, but in a relatively quiet setting that also features more traditional Indonesian sights such as family temples and rice fields.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
With its stunning Pacific views and sought-after location, Hale Makena Maui is one of the most impressive 4-bedroom Maui villas available. This resplendent villa is found beachside in Makena, just south of the ultra-luxurious enclave of Wailea; escape the crowds in favor of a more tranquil, yet equally upscale Maui experience. The villa recently underwent a complete redesign at the hands of James McIntyre Design, a firm specializing in style-forward decor. Hale Makena Maui is a fully legal and permitted Maui vacation rental, Permit Number: STKM 2013/0011.

With over 4,800 sq ft of indoor and outdoor living space, you’re sure to find your favorite spot to enjoy the Hawaiian sun. Sit back on your terrace and gaze out to the ocean, or walk around your infinity pool, savoring the scent of lush, tropical gardens. Make the most of outdoor living with the alfresco poolside dining area, private cabana bar and gas barbecue. Sink into the jacuzzi with a freshly mixed Mai Tai and watch a glorious sunset light up the horizon.

The modern, air-conditioned interior is designed for maximum comfort, and an immense, retractable wall joins the great room to your outdoor living spaces. From the large, elegant living and dining area that shares in the ocean views, to the fabulous gourmet kitchen, this is a stylish, contemporary and beautifully presented home from all rooms. The decorative touches are distinctly contemporary, yet their shapes, materials and colors pay homage to traditional Hawaiian aesthetics. Turquoise hues radiate from artwork and upholstery, while sofas, walls and ceilings reflect sandy beach tones.

Three ocean view suites have luxurious en-suite bathrooms and magnificent ocean views, with the two upstairs rooms benefiting from private lanais. These three suites are fitted with King-size beds and the fourth bedroom presents a very stylish Queen bed. The Master suite enjoys its own sitting area, and boasts an immense walk-in closet with custom wood cabinets. All bedrooms have air-conditioning, a flat-screen television and Blu-ray DVD players.

There’s a huge amount to see and do in the vicinity. Golf and shopping are a 5-minute drive away, and an exciting array of watersports, including scuba diving, snorkeling and kayaking can be found just a two-minute walk from the property. This part of South Maui is rich in wildlife, with turtles, eagle rays and dolphins frequently spotted. This luxury home looks directly down on a pristine coral reef that can be seen from the master bedroom balcony.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

Hawaii Permit #: STKM20130011

listing.listing_description:
The indoor and outdoor spaces merge seamlessly—and the days blend together into one dreamy holiday—at Villa Suami. Beautifully designed and thoughtfully furnished, this incredible Bali vacation rental is the perfect place to escape with up to ten friends or relax with your extended family in a private haven surrounded by palm trees.

Your stay at this luxury property includes the services of a chef, who can prepare an Indonesian or continental breakfast each day, as well as a housekeeper and property manager. All you have to do is decide which of the two pools to sit by—or whether to sip your refreshments in a lounger or in the outdoor living room. After sunset, the media room, cable TV and Wi-Fi offer equally appealing entertainment options.

In addition to the shaded al-fresco living and dining rooms, Villa Suami has an inviting open-plan great room with sitting and dining areas and a fully equipped kitchen, whose glass walls can be pushed back to let the breeze inside. Polished concrete floors, an extensive collection of artwork and eclectic furnishings make the space feel like the loft-inspired home of a well-traveled friend.

The villa has three bedrooms with king beds, including a honeymoon-worthy master suite with its own terrace, one bedroom with a double bed and one bedroom with four twin beds that’s ideal for a group of kids. All five bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms and air conditioning.

Villa Suami is a short drive from trendy Canggu, home to an ever-expanding range of restaurants, bars and shops, as well as Canggu Beach. The nearest swimmable beach is in Seminyak, about a 20-minute drive away, and Petitenget and Kuta are also within easy reach. Avid players can plan to tee off at the Nirwana Bali golf course.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Feel the fresh tropical breeze everywhere you go at this open-air Balinese villa in Kuta. While the private chef prepares breakfast, catch up on some reading and sip herbal tea beneath a beach umbrella. At night, gather the group around the fire pit or lay back in a sunbed to watch the stars. Next morning, start the day with a stroll along Petitenget Beach or sign-up for a surfing lesson.

At Eshara’s center, the refreshing swimming pool is outlined with lush gardens and palm trees. Moving to the terrace, you’ll appreciate several smaller lounge areas that are perfect when you need to escape the group for more intimate moments. The open concept living room is decorated in vibrant textiles and contemporary furniture set beneath an extra-high exposed-beam roof. If every bit of lingering stress hasn’t melted away, treat yourself to a long soak in the master ensuite’s spa-like tub.

Grab your camera and your hiking boots for a day on the trails of Mount Batukaru. Follow winding paths through lush jungle and stop at the scenic lookouts for a picnic. After, head to Tanah Lot for sunset. The ancient Balinese temple in the sea looks extra-incredible as the sun sinks into the horizon. For dinner, you’ll find plenty of options in Seminyak. Later, dance the night away on the beach at Finn’s Recreation Club.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Discover a private romantic paradise in beautiful Kona, Hawaii! Twice featured in West Hawaii Today for its outstanding luxury qualities, Collessie By The Sea is nestled within an exclusive community overlooking the charming town of Kona. Here you will find an experience that will leave you and your loved ones with fond memories, while likely instilling a yearning to return year after year, like so many of the villa’s distinguished guests.

Tumble out of bed and into the saline waters of the solar heated infinity swimming pool with cascading waterfalls. This luxury home enjoys a seamless Hawaiian indoor/outdoor living plan. Its disappearing walls of glass open to a limestone lanai with a large built-in gas barbecue, entertainment area and granite counter preparation area. This stunning vacation rental is located in the “golden triangle” with the perfect elevation, climate and proximity to Kona village and local attractions.

Custom designed with high end interior and exterior finishes, including African mahogany, travertine stone floors and exotic granite. The gracious living room has a large screen television and comfortable seating. The designer kitchen is fully equipped for entertaining with decor to captivate a mood that inspires creativity alongside an eight burner gas stove, warming drawer, built-in fridge and walk-in pantry.

Each of the three bedroom suites have bathrooms with floor-to-ceiling travertine walk-in showers with room for two. Each suite also has a flat screen television. Both the Aloha and Makai suites open directly to the pool and have exotic soaker tubs with dual vanities. Each sleeping quarter has been beautifully designed with high quality furnishings and Asian flair.

Although difficult to leave such an oasis, premier beach access, shopping and golf are just minutes away. We also provide our guests with a list of recommended restaurants and activities. It makes a great bet for a family holiday or a decadent honeymoon. We want your vacation to be memorable, one that will have you falling in love with Hawaii, Kona and Collessie By The Sea!

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
A glass of New Zealand wine, a sunset, and the mountain views from Karamata, and your worries won’t be able to stick around. The drama of Lake Wakatipu and the peaks of The Remarkables fills almost every room of this alpine-inspired townhouse. When you’re ready for outdoor adventure—or just dinner at a waterfront restaurant—it’s only a 10-minute downhill walk into central Queenstown.

 

On sunny days, watch the light sparkle on the lake from a lounger on the villa’s terrace or balcony. In cooler weather, or after a day out in the mountains, leave gear in the ski storage area, flip on the gas fireplace and heated floors, and cozy up to the satellite TV, Sonos sound system, and Wi-Fi.

 

A stone fireplace surround anchors the L-shaped great room at this vacation rental, where the living and dining areas face Queenstown, the lake, and the mountains, and the fully equipped kitchen has its own views from behind the dining area. The cream and brown color scheme is perked up by red upholstery and artwork around the dining table.

 

This luxury property has 2 bedrooms with king beds and en-suite bathrooms, and an especially private master bedroom with a queen bed and en-suite bathroom that’s on its own floor—perfect for a couple wanting honeymoon-style seclusion. Together, the 3 bedrooms can accommodate up to 6 friends or family members.

 

A holiday at Karamata means you’re a 10-minute walk or less than a 10-minute drive from all the attractions of Queenstown, whether that means shops, restaurants, the lovely Queenstown Gardens, or the headquarters of Remarkable Golf Tours. Don’t miss the thrills at Skyline Queenstown, a 5-minute drive from the villa, where you can board a gondola for a trip up a mountain, then pilot a luge back down.

 

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.
