listing.listing_description:
Please note: This home is in close proximity to an ongoing construction project. For more information, please contact a Villa Specialist.

Take a holiday on a grand scale at Villa Mary. One of the most expansive and private residences on the grounds of Bali’s exclusive Pantai Lima estate, this gorgeous vacation rental offers views as far as the ocean and rice fields. Attentive service, access to shared amenities and five bedrooms make for an atmosphere of welcoming luxury for up to ten guests.

Your stay at Pantai Lima includes the services of a cook, property manager, butler, housekeeper and driver. Guests of Villa Mary are welcome at the estate’s shared tennis court and fitness center, and the villa has its own outdoor living spaces with areas for sitting, dining and lounging; a palm-tree-lined pool and hot tub; and views of the Indian Ocean.

Enjoy the tropical weather from open-sided pavilions or cool off in the indoor living and dining areas; serene water features link the two. Sleek furnishings and natural textures—think wire dining chairs with a live-edge table—are fresh and modern. For entertainment, there’s a spacious home theater, sound system and Wi-Fi.

Villa Mary has four bedrooms with queen beds, en-suite bathrooms and air conditioning, as well as a terrace or balcony. The fifth bedroom has two twin beds and air conditioning, and adjoins the master suite, making it perfect for a family traveling with younger children.

With its out-of-a-postcard beaches and bohemian vibe, Bali appeals to everyone from backpackers to honeymooners. Embrace its laid-back ambience with a walk to the nearest beach on the villa’s private path or a short drive to Seminyak Beach, the closest swimmable stretch. Bring kids to the Canggu Club and chase thrills on the waterslides, or book a tee time at Nirwana Bali Golf Course and go after your best score.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

The stunning villa, recognised in Architectural Digest & Architecture Magazine for its spectacular design, is perfectly nestled into the natural landscape right on the shores of Lake Wanaka and is available on an exclusive-use basis for up to 14 guests, featuring 6 bedrooms and 6.5 bathrooms.

You may never wish to leave the property. On over 330 acres of lakeside farmlands, thoughtfully planted with nearly 1 million native plants, you can enjoy a range of on-site experiences.

If you wish to explore the local area, golf courses, wineries and water sports are nearby. The on site helipad also opens up access to Queenstown, Fiordland National Park, Milford Sound, Mt Aspiring National Park and the wild West Coast of New Zealand.

Included in your stay at Piwakawaka Point is an on-site host, daily housekeeping, concierge service, luxury linen and bathroom amenities, general pantry provisions, a glass of Central Otago sparkling wine on arrival and fresh flowers.

From the expansive Big Island views to the great location, a stay at Champion Ridge 24 will make you feel like a winner. Set on a rise overlooking the golf course at Mauna Lani Resort, this beautifully appointed vacation rental blends the best of natural scenery and resort convenience. Reserve its three bedrooms for a warm-weather holiday with family, a golf getaway with friends or even an indulgent Hawaiian honeymoon.

The villa opens to an expansive private lanai where you can while away sunny days on the loungers or in the infinity pool. As the sun sinks into the Pacific, heat up the barbecue for dinner at the al-fresco table, have a soak in the hot tub and spot constellations you’ve never seen before with the telescope. If you prefer more high-tech entertainment, there is also a television and Wi-Fi.

A wall of sliding glass is the only thing separating the lanai from the great room of this luxury residence; opening it creates one large indoor-outdoor living area. A vaulted ceiling and carved paneling add traditional touches to the breezy sitting and dining areas, and there’s no more inviting place to pull up a stool than the breakfast bar in the fully equipped kitchen.

Champion Ridge 24 has two bedrooms with king beds, including the master bedroom, and one bedroom with two twin-over-double bunk beds; all three bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms. Though there are ceiling fans throughout the villa to keep you comfortable, only the bedrooms have air conditioning.

Guests of Champion Ridge 24 are welcome to use the Mauna Lani Beach Club, 1 mile away, and can make arrangements at extra cost to play on the golf course, have a treatment at the spa or use the tennis courts, all about a 5-minute drive from the villa. Be sure to leave time to explore beyond the resort, whether it’s strolling the white sands of Hapuna Beach or finding a favorite spot to sip locally grown Kona coffee.
